alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 1:46AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CAMERON... SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN ACADIA AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 230 AM CST... At 146 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Klondike, Morse, Riceville, Wright, Lowry, and Florence Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
